description: In this fourth-year-level Chinese course, students explore a specified topic or theme in
language, in various text/media (literature, newspaper, television, and film), in
culture/civilization, or in a combination of these, through close examination of texts
(written or visual), discussion, analysis, and interpretation of selected materials.
Specific topics vary by instructor and semester. May be repeated if topic is different.
Taught in Chinese.  Counts toward management studies concentration. Prerequisite: CHIN 302 or
